description: Yui is a big fan and initially an assistant of http://anidb.net/ch15363 [Girls Dead Monster]. She enjoys playing guitar and singing on the street. She is known to be hyperactive and talks extremely fast. http://anidb.net/ch15355 [Hinata] finds her annoying, which results in bouts between the two of them. She wears a devil tail and shackle bracelets on her wrists, giving her an image of an imp or devil. She also has wings hidden by her hair on her back. After http://anidb.net/ch15354 [Iwasawa]`s departure, Yui becomes the new rhythm guitarist and vocalist of http://anidb.net/ch15363 [Girls Dead Monster], as well as assuming the leader position. Yui plays a Gibson SG Special electric guitar. She later becomes a part of the main http://anidb.net/ch15364 [SSS], following them along on missions. In life, Yui was paralyzed from the neck down after being hit by a car, which caused her to be bedridden. She wanted to do a lot of things in her life, such as performing a German suplex, playing soccer, and hitting a home run, inspirations she witnessed on television while bedridden and were left unfulfilled due to her paralysis. Her most important dream of all was to get married. This dream was fulfilled by http://anidb.net/ch15355 [Hinata], who stated that he would marry her, even if she was paralyzed. Yui finds peace in http://anidb.net/ch15355 [Hinata]`s words and passes on in episode ten.
name: Yui
